title: Respiratory Infections And Asthma
content:
Be careful around cleaning agents and disinfectants. Some cleaning agents can cause asthma attacks or other adverse reactions.
Protect others by:
Staying home when you are sick.
Stay home from work, school, and public areas when you are sick.
Wearing a mask or NIOSH Approved N95 respirator
with the best fit, protection, and comfort when around other people.
Covering your coughs and sneezes.
